original: 《三國演義》所虛構之人物，為郭汜部將。獻帝東奔時，郭汜命崔勇急追，被當時在楊奉麾下的徐晃斬於馬下。
text: The fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is Guo Bang's general. When Emperor Xian was running to the east, Guo Bin ordered Cui Yong to chase him eagerly, and was slashed by Xu Huang, who was then under Yang Feng's command.
